A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney is trying to use friendly media outlets to claim there's an online conspiracy to reduce the film's score on Rotten Tomatoes - no\, sorry\, there are really good reasons to have been underwhelmed by this not-awful but not-great film. Unnecessarily long given sub-plots that go nowhere at all; utterly unfocused; so little time with any character that it's near impossible to feel anything for any of what occurs; cutesy CGI animals sprayed over the top; nudge-nudge-wink-to-camera lines and moments breaking the mood... This film needed a lot of flab trimming. Still\, it was diverting\, fun\, had the core of something good in the middle of it.
